body.p: Bongo Tool is a command application to manipulate and interrogate an Bongo Repository. An Bongo Repository is a Cassandra, Hbase Instance or MapDB File(s). The Bongo tool can be used to maintain such a repository. The operations supported by tools can be used in tandum with the Bongo Navigator and Bongo Manager.

Bongo Tool can be used load/extract and examine the contents of one or more stores. In addition, Bongo Tool maintains data within the store that is used to indicate that a store has been exported, indexed and when the store was created. These values can be view in 'Bongo Console', 'Bongo Manager' and 'Bongo Explorer'.
Essentially, 'Bongo Command' can import and export files of any size, whilst 'Bongo Manger' is designed for files the import and export of files less than 100G in size. Note that this restriction does not apply to 'Bongo Navigator'.
